CustomField.description: ** System Calculated ** Badges can be auto-assigned to Contacts based on "Assignment" the link to the "Assignment" record is used to auto-unassign the badge when the Contact has been "Unassigned".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated ** Badges can be auto-assigned to Contacts based on "Assignment" the link to the "Assignment" record is used to auto-unassign the badge when the Contact has been "Unassigned".
CustomField.label: Assignment
